briefTitle: A Long-term Efficacy and Safety Study of Tramadol Hydrochloride Plus Acetaminophen (JNS013) in Japanese Participants With Chronic Pain
officialTitle: A Study of a Long-term Administration of JNS013 in Patients With Chronic Pain
summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the efficacy and safety of tramadol hydrochloride plus acetaminophen (JNS013) with long term administration in participants with chronic pain.

primaryOutcome.measure: Change From Baseline in Visual Analogue Scale (VAS24) Score at Week 4
